mapper.select: SELECT sp.page_name AS pageName, sp.description AS des, null AS category, sp.url AS pageUrl, null AS pageImage, null AS endDate FROM seach_pages sp WHERE sp.page_name LIKE '%${kword}%' UNION ALL SELECT c.title AS pageName, null AS des, c.topic_big AS category, c.id AS pageUrl, c.image_main AS pageImage, c.edate AS endDate FROM contents c WHERE c.title LIKE '%${kword}%' ORDER BY pageName
